title: Air transport, registered carrier departures worldwide
name: is.air.dprt
readme: Registered carrier departures worldwide are domestic takeoffs and takeoffs abroad of air carriers registered in the country.

fields.name: Country Code
fields.description: ISO 3-digit ISO code extended to include regional codes e.g. EUR, ARB etc

fields.name: Value
fields.description: Registered carrier departures worldwide are domestic takeoffs and takeoffs abroad of air carriers registered in the country.
